artist: Mariette Lydis; Text by John Gay; The Limited Editions Club; Marius Audin Press, Lyon, France , (text); Mourlot Freres, Paris , (prints)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke

title: The Beggar's Opera
